moves.3... Nf6 4. Nh3: figuring white consider a 1700 player as a beginner :-) or not?
moves.4... h6 5. Nc3: ok, the development could be seen as even...
moves.6. Qd1: better than Qd3, blocking the dark bishop. Strangely the computer prefers Qd3
moves.6... Bc5 7. f4 d6 8. f5: looks like we are playing: "the first who takes loses"
moves.10... Qxf6: the white king size is almost forbidden to rook: all black pieces are turned to it.
moves.11. g3: very strange move: Nh3 is no more protected, f3 is almost free for my knight (almost) and... why?
moves.11... Bxf5: this is after all a miscalculated sacrifice. But I finally got a draw situation after the tension...
moves.12. Rf1 d5: this was my key move: if Rxf5 Nxf5 exf dxc4 and I am better. If exf, then dxc4 and I keep the pawn.
moves.13. b4 Bb6 14. c3: this is the move I didn't calculate.
moves.14... dxc4 15. cxd4 Bxd4 16. Rxf5 Qe6: this situation is better for black, because the queen is watchin h3 through the rook... If white protects the rook a1, then g6 sees the knight.
moves.17. Rb1 g6 18. Nf4: gives the knigt for a pawn.
moves.19. Nxg6 fxg6 20. Rf1: my pawn structure is better than with exf4
moves.20... O-O-O: exposing to Qg4+, with the idea in mind this is not a problem
moves.22. Rxf8 Qxf8: once again, the sacrifice of a pawn is not a problem
moves.26. Qe2 h5: g4 is no more an option, except for an exchange
moves.27. a4: trying to open the queen side
moves.27... b5: closing, or opening at my advantage
moves.29. Qf2: good answer, threatening to enter into b6+ and destroying pawn structure
moves.30. Qe3 Kc7 31. Ke2 Qe6 32. Kf2 Qg4: this is a new opportunity on e4.
moves.33. Re1: of course: the idea is to immobilize queen and rook
moves.33... Kd6 34. Re2 c5: ... so that I pass with the king on the queen side
moves.37... Qxg5 38. hxg5: white structure is ruined. Though the difference is still one pawn ahead for me, i am much much better.
moves.39... b2 40. Re1 Rxd2+ 41. Ke3 c3 42. Rh: preparing last bullet on g4, i guess
moves.43. Rd1 Rxg3+ 44. Kf2 Rxg5 45. Rd5+ Kc4: i guess white tried to obtain a draw by pat
